question: I went to Virtue restaurant & bar in Chicago for my birthday on March 22, 2021 and the main course I had was delicious!  Unfortunately, when I went back about a month later on April 21, it was no longer on the dinner menu.  Using the Wayback Machine, can you help me figure out which main course was on the dinner menu for Virtue on March 22, 2021 but not April 21, 2021? Answer using the singular form, without articles.

trajectory.question: I went to Virtue restaurant & bar in Chicago for my birthday on March 22, 2021 and the main course I had was delicious!  Unfortunately, when I went back about a month later on April 21, it was no longer on the dinner menu.  Using the Wayback Machine, can you help me figure out which main course was on the dinner menu for Virtue on March 22, 2021 but not April 21, 2021? Answer using the singular form, without articles.

trajectory.actor_reasoning: I need to find archived versions of Virtue's dinner menu around March and April 2021 to compare items.

args.query: Virtue restaurant Chicago dinner menu Wayback Machine March 2021

tool_executed.name: web_search
tool_executed.result:
Found 3 relevant web results:

1. Menus - Virtue Restaurant
   URL: https://www.virtuerestaurant.com/menus/
   Site: virtuerestaurant.com
   Summary: All reservations are allotted a 90 minute seating time. Small Rations. biscuits. pimento cheese & local honey. $12.

2. dinner menu | Virtue Restaurant
   URL: https://www.virtuerestaurant.com/menu/dine-in-small-large-rations-copy/
   Site: virtuerestaurant.com
   Summary: We accept up to 4 forms of debit/credit payment for every table. We do not have cash in the restaurant. All reservations are allotted a 90 minute seating time.

3. Virtue Restaurant
   URL: https://www.virtuerestaurant.com/
   Site: virtuerestaurant.com
   Summary: Stationed in the Hyde Park neighborhood of Chicago, Virtue is a Southern American restaurant that leads with a culture of hospitality & kindness.
